title: Chicken with chorizo, peppers and sage with spiced aubergine
description: This summery recipe of chicken roasted with chorizo and peppers is perfect for a relaxed weekend lunch.
ingredients: 1 large corn-fed chicken, jointed into 8 pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
handful coriander leaves, picked from stems
1 tbsp pine nuts, lightly toasted in a pan
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
